attributes.action: ensure that Justice Secretary, Jack Straw and his fraudulent colleagues do the same time in prison as Ronnie Biggs
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Justice Secretary; Jack Straw and his fraudulent colleagues must do the full term of prison time handed down in law for their various crimes which were more calculated, methodical, prolonged and ruthless than those of Ronnie Biggs. Failure to comply with this request would not be in the interests of democracy. Indeed they would be viewed as the actions of a fascist government. You cannot exercise law based on a whim. It applies equally to all or it does not apply.

reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
